00024 /*! \file FileHeaderReader.h This file provides methods to read a generic file header.
00025  */
00026

00041 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00042 {
00043         /*! This class reads the FileHeader of the generic data file. */
00044 class FileHeaderReader
00045 {
00046 public:
00047         /*! Constructor
00048          *      @param fs Open fstream positioned at the start of the file.
00049          *      @param fh FileHeader object to fill.
00050          */
00051         FileHeaderReader(std::ifstream& fs, FileHeader &fh);
00052 
00053         /*! Reads the FileHeader. 
00054          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException The file version does not match.
00055          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException The file is not of the right type.
00056          */
00057         void Read();
00058 
00059         /*! Gets the number of DataGroups in the file.
00060          *      @return Number of DataGroups.
00061          */
00062         u_int32_t GetDataGroupCnt() const { return dataGroupCnt; }
00063 
00064         /*! Gets the file position of the first DataGroup header. */
00065         u_int32_t GetFirstDataGroupFilePos() const { return firstDataGroupFilePos; }
00066 
00067 protected:
00068         /*! Reads the magic number from the file. 
00069          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException The file is not of the right type.
00070         */
00071         void ReadMagicNumber();
00072 
00073         /*! Reads the generic file version number from the file.
00074          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException The file version does not match.
00075          */
00076         void ReadVersion();
00077 
00078         /*! Reads the DataGroup count from the file. */
00079         void ReadDataGroupCnt();
00080 
00081         /*! Reads the file position of the first DataGroup. */
00082         void ReadFirstDataGroupFilePos();
00083 
00084         /*! Reads the GenericDataHeader from the file. */
00085         void ReadGenericDataHdr();
00086 
00087 protected:
00088         /*! A reference to the file stream. */
00089         std::ifstream& fileStream;
00090 
00091         /*! FileHeader object to fill. */
00092         FileHeader& header;
00093 
00094         /*! Number of DataGroups. */
00095         u_int32_t dataGroupCnt;
00096 
00097         /*! Position of the first DataGroup. */
00098         u_int32_t firstDataGroupFilePos;
00099 };

00101 }
